trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: If a creature tries to read Belashyrra's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 22} or be {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. La criatura {@condition atordit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Eye Thief
entries: Belashyrra can see through the eyes of all creatures within 120 feet of it. It can use its Raig d'Ull through any creature within 120 feet of it, as though it were in that creature's space.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Belashyrra falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Belashyrra té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Belashyrra recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Belashyrra dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Teleportació
entries: Com a acció bonus, Belashyrra can teleport fins a 30 peus to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Belashyrra fa dos atacs with its claws and uses its Raig d'Ull once.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Raig d'Ull
entries: Belashyrra shoots one of the following magical eye rays of its choice, targeting one creature it can see within 120 feet of it:

items.name: 1. Psyche-Reconstruction Ray.
items.entry: L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 22}. Qui falli rep 49 ({@damage 9d10}) de dany psíquic; qui superi, en rep la meitat. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it dies and transforms into a spectator under Belashyrra's control and acts immediately after Belashyrra in the initiative order. The target can't be returned to its original form by any means short of a {@spell desig} spell.

items.name: 2. Domination Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 22} or be {@condition fascinat} by Belashyrra for 1 minute or until the target takes damage. Belashyrra can issue telepathic commands to the {@condition fascinat} creature (no requereix acció), que obeïrà tan bé com podrà.

items.name: 3. Mind-Weakening Ray.
items.entry: The target ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 22} or take 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany psíquic and be unable to cast spells or activate magic items durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 4. Blinding Ray.
items.entry: The target and each creature within 10 feet of ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 22} or take 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany radiant and be {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. Until this blindness ends, Belyshyrra can see through the {@condition encegat} creature's eyes. La criatura {@condition encegat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

legendary.name: Urpa
entries: Belashyrra makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Implant Fear (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Belashyrra targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 22} or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic and immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from Belashyrra.

legendary.name: Rend Reality (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Belashyrra rips at the bonds of reality in its immediate area. Each creature within 10 feet of Belashyrra ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 22} or take 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany de força and gain one level of {@condition exhaust}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The knight is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de paladí preparats:

trait.name: Commander of Bones
entries: Com a acció bonus, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14}. Si falla, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to twelve undead at a time this way.

trait.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
entries: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Canviar Aparença
entries: The changeling can use its action to polymorph into a Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The changeling fa dos atacs with its dagger.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Pinta Esgarrifant (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the changeling ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The clawfoot té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de clawfoot's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: Si el clawfoot es mou, com a mínim, 20 peus directe cap a una criatura i l'impacta amb un atac Urpa, tot al mateix torn, l'objectiu ha de salvar per Força {@dc 11}. Si falla, està {@condition enderrocat}. Si l'objectiu està {@condition enderrocat}, el clawfoot pot fer un atac Mossegada com a acció bonus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The clawfoot fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Dolgaunt
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the dolgaunt is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, the dolgaunt instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the dolgaunt is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dolgaunt makes two tentacle attacks and two atacs desarmats. Up to two tentacle attacks can be replaced by Vitality Drain.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. L'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Mentre duri aquesta presa, the dolgaunt can't use the same tentacle on another target. The dolgaunt has two tentacles.

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Vitality Drain
entries: One creature {@condition grappled} by a tentacle of the dolgaunt ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. Si falla, rep 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic, and the dolgaunt regains a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

trait.name: Dual Consciousness
entries: The dolgrim has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, and knocked {@condition inconscient}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dolgrim fa tres atacs.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The hag's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The hag té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hag makes two Nightmare Touch attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Nightmare Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany psíquic. If the target is {@condition inconscient}, it takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic and is cursed until the hag dies or the curse is removed. The cursed creature's punts de vida màxims decreases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) whenever it finishes a long rest.

reaction.name: Dream Eater
entries: When an {@condition inconscient} creature the hag can see within 30 feet of her regains consciousness, the hag can force the creature to make a {@dc 15} Saviesa saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic, and the hag regains hit points equal to the amount of damage taken.

trait.name: Alien Mind
entries: If a creature tries to read Dyrrn's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 23} or be {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. La criatura {@condition atordit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Dyrrn falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Dyrrn té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Dyrrn recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If Dyrrn takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Dyrrn dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Teleportació
entries: Com a acció bonus, Dyrrn can teleport fins a 30 peus to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Dyrrn makes one Tentacle Whip attack and uses its Corruption once. Dyrrn can replace its Tentacle Whip attack with Extract Brain if it has a creature {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Tentacle Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) de dany tallant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 23} per escapar), pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of Dyrrn, iha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 23} or be {@condition atordit} mentre duri aquesta presa. Dyrrn can't use the same tentacle whip on another target mentre duri aquesta presa. Dyrrn has two tentacle whips.

action.name: Corruption
entries: Dyrrn targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23} or take 22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) de dany necròtic and become corrupted durant 1 minut.

A corrupted creature's flesh twists in alien ways. The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, its speed is reduced by half, and if it tries to cast a spell, it must first succeed on a {@dc 15} Intel·ligència check or the spell fails and is wasted. The corrupted creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one {@condition incapacitat} creature {@condition grappled} by Dyrrn. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany perforant. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Dyrrn kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

legendary.name: Tentacle Whip
entries: Dyrrn makes one attack with its Tentacle Whip.

legendary.name: Spawn Aberration (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Dyrrn regurgitates an intellect devourer in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The intellect devourer is under Dyrrn's control and acts immediately after Dyrrn in the initiative order.

legendary.name: Explosió Mental (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Dyrrn emet energia psíquica màgicament en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Intel·ligència de {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 30 ({@damage 5d8 + 8}) de dany psíquic i està {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

monster.name: Expeditious Messenger
idiomes: one language spoken by its creator

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The messenger no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the messenger is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Quickness {@recharge 5}
entries: The fastieth can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The quori's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quori uses its Mind Thrust twice.

action.name: Idyllic Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany de força. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or fall {@condition enderrocat} in a fit of laughter.

action.name: Desestabilització Cerebral
entries: The quori targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 16} or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitat} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and retè l'alineament, la Intel·ligència, la Saviesa, el Carisma, i la immunitat a ésser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}. La resta d'estadístiques són les de l'objectiu, però no en guanya els coneixements, trets de classes, o competències.

The possession lasts until the body es queda a 0 punts de vida, the quori ends it com a acció bonus, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. Quan la possessió acaba the quori reapareix en un espai lliure a 5 peus del cos. L'objectiu és immune a possessions d'aquest this quori's durant 24 hores des que supera la salvada o la possessió acaba.

reaction.name: Empathic Feedback
entries: When the quori takes damage from a creature it can see within 60 feet of it, the quori can force that creature to succeed on a {@dc 16} Intel·ligència saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The Inspired's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ment dual
entries: The Inspired has advantage on Saviesa saving throws.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Inspired makes two crysteel dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with mofa i escarni.

action.name: Crysteel Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Mofa i Escarni (Truc)
entries: The Inspired unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the Inspired, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany psíquic and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

variant.name: Quori Vessel
entries: The Inspired are vessels for quori spirits, allowing the quori to manifest a portion of their power while the vessel is possessed. An Inspired can gain benefits depending on the type of quori possessing it. The quori also gains access to the Inspired's knowledge and features.

entries.name: Suggestion (3/Dia)
entries: The Inspired can cast the {@spell suggestió} spell ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur), sense que calguin components materials.

entries.name: All Around Vision
entries: The Inspired can't be surprised.

entries.name: Ull Arcà (3/Dia)
entries: The Inspired can cast the {@spell ull arcà} spell, sense que calguin components materials.

entries.name: Fear (1/Dia)
entries: The Inspired can cast the {@spell temor} spell ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur), sense que calguin components materials.

monster.name: Defensor de Ferro
idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: The defender has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the defender is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or take an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant and be {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar). The defender can have only one creature {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The quori's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 21} salvada de conjur, {@hit 13} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: All-Around Vision
entries: The quori can't be surprised while it isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The quori pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The quori té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quori makes two Soul Binding attacks. Alternatively, it can make four attacks with Arcane Blast.

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 13} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) de dany de força.

action.name: Soul Binding
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 13} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany necròtic. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and has its soul imprisoned in one of the quori's eyes. The target can't be revived by any means short of a {@spell desig} spell until the quori is destroyed.

action.name: Mind Seed (1/Dia)
entries: The quori touches one humanoid, which ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 21} or be cursed. The curse lasts until it's removed by a anul·lar maledicció or restabliment superior spell.

The cursed target suffers 1 level of {@condition exhaust} every 24 hours, and finishing a long rest doesn't reduce its {@condition exhaust}. If the cursed target reaches {@condition exhaust} level 6, it doesn't die; it instead becomes a thrall under the quori's control, and all its {@condition exhaust} is removed. Only the {@spell desig} spell can free the thrall from this control.

action.name: Swarm of Eyes {@recharge}
entries: The quori creates a swarm of spectral eyes that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21}. On a failure, a creature takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany psíquic, and it is {@condition encegat} durant 1 minut. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage i no està {@condition encegat}. Una criatura {@condition encegat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 21} or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitat} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and retè l'alineament, la Intel·ligència, la Saviesa, el Carisma, i la immunitat a ésser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}. La resta d'estadístiques són les de l'objectiu, però no en guanya els coneixements, trets de classes, o competències.

The possession lasts until the body es queda a 0 punts de vida, the quori ends it com a acció bonus, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. Quan la possessió acaba the quori reapareix en un espai lliure a 5 peus del cos. L'objectiu és immune a possessions d'aquest this quori's durant 24 hores des que supera la salvada o la possessió acaba.

trait.name: Ment dual
entries: The kalashtar has advantage on Saviesa saving throws.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Desestabilització Cerebral
entries: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The soldier té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de soldier's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: Si hi ha dany que redueix al zombi a 0 punts de vida, ha de salvar Constitució amb CD de 5 + el dany rebut (si el dany no és radiant o crític). Si supera, el zombi es queda amb 1 punt de vida i no 0.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The soldier attacks three times with one of its weapons.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The soldier adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the soldier must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Illmarrow és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 20. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 23} salvada de conjur, {@hit 15} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Illmarrow falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Illmarrow té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: Illmarrow's body turns to dust when she es queda a 0 punts de vida, and her equipment is left behind. She gains a new body after {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within two hundred miles of the location at which she was destroyed.

action.name: Mà Morta (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 15} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Illmarrow's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against Illmarrow until the end of her next turn.

action.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 20} o estar {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: Illmarrow exhales poisonous gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de verí i està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. Qui superi, la criatura rep la meitat del dany i no està {@condition emmetzinat}.

A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises at the start of Illmarrow's next turn as a zombie. The zombie acts immediately after Illmarrow in the initiative count and is permanently under her command, following her verbal orders.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Illmarrow casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Claw
entries: Illmarrow uses her Paralyzing Claw.

legendary.name: Frightening Presence (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Illmarrow targets up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 20} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Un objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Illmarrow's Frightening Presence durant les properes 24 hores.

legendary.name: Alè Verinós (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Illmarrow recharges her Alè Verinós and uses it.

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The living spell pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The living spell té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The living spell pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The living spell té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@dice 5d6 + 5}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell creates a 40-foot-diameter sphere of fog within 60 feet of it (the fog s'extén per les cantonades). When a creature enters the fog per primer cop en un torn o hi començi el torn, it ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

The fog moves 10 feet away from the living spell a l'inici de cada torn seu, rolling along the ground and through openings. The fog lasts for 10 minutes or until the living spell's concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The living spell pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The living spell té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

action.name: Magical Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Spell Mimicry {@recharge 5}
entries: The living spell unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The magewright's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur). To cast one of its rituals, the magewright must provide additional material components whose value in gold pieces is 20 times the spell's level. These components are consumed when the ritual is finished. The magewright knows the following spells:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Mordakhesh's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Mordakhesh pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Immunitat Màgica Limitada
entries: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Mordakhesh makes three greatsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força.

action.name: Esfera Cromàtica
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@dice 3d8}) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts esfera cromàtica.

legendary.name: Chromatic Resistència
entries: Modakhesh gains resistance to one damage type of his choice—acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder—fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

legendary.name: Warlord's Command (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Mordakhesh targets up to two allies that he can see within 30 feet of him. If a target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The radiant idol's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 17} salvació de conjur). The radiant idol pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Aura of False Divinity
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the radiant idol ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17}, provided the radiant idol isn't {@condition incapacitat}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition fascinat} by the radiant idol. A creature {@condition fascinat} in this way can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The radiant idol té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The radiant idol fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Radiant Strike (1/Dia)
entries: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of it. Un cilindre de 30 peus de radi i 40 d'alçada of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany radiant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Rak Tulkhesh's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 24} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Deadly Critical
entries: Rak Tulkhesh scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Rak Tulkhesh falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Rak Tulkhesh té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Whirlwind of Weapons
entries: A magical aura of weapons surrounds Rak Tulkhesh in a 10 foot radius. A l'inici de cada torn seu, any other creature in the aura takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Rak Tulkhesh makes four weapon attacks.

action.name: Spawned Arma Cos a Cos
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) de dany de força.

action.name: Spawned Arma a distància
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) de dany de força.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: Rak Tulkhesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (his choice).

In a new form, Rak Tulkhesh retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Resistència Llegendària, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Rak Tulkhesh makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: End Magic (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Rak Tulkhesh casts dissipar màgia.

legendary.name: Provoke Rage (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of Rak Tulkhesh ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 24} or use its reaction to make a atac armat cos a cos against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a atac armat a distància against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary. This attack is made with advantage and gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.

trait.name: Shifting (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 punts de vida temporals. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Sul Khatesh's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 26} salvada de conjur, {@hit 18} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Sul Khatesh falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Sul Khatesh té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Master of Magic
entries: Sul Khatesh has advantage on Constitució saving throws to maintain concentration.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Sul Khatesh fa quatre atacs with Arcane Blast.

action.name: Arcane Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 18} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d10 + 10}) de dany de força.

action.name: Magic Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 5d12 + 4}) de dany de força.

action.name: Arcane Cataclysm (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Sul Khatesh conjures orbs of magical energy that plummet to the ground at three different points she can see within 1 mile of her. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 26}, taking 71 ({@damage 11d12}) de dany de força on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat. A creature in the area of more than one arcane burst is affected only once. The area of each arcane burst then acts as an camp antimàgic durant 1 hora. Sul Khatesh and spells she casts are unaffected by these fields.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: Sul Khatesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Sul Khatesh's choice).

In a new form, Sul Khatesh retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Resistència Llegendària, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Sul Khatesh fa dos atacs with her Arcane Blast or one attack with her magic staff.

legendary.name: Consume Magic (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Sul Khatesh targets a creature within 120 feet of her who is concentrating on a spell. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 26} or its concentration is broken on the spell, and Sul Khatesh gains 5 punts de vida temporals per level of that spell.

legendary.name: Maddening Secrets (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Sul Khatesh whispers an arcane secret into the mind of a creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 26} or expend one of its spell slots of 3rd level or lower and deal 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de força to each creature within 30 feet of it. A creature that fails the saving throw but can't expend a spell slot is instead {@condition atordit} fins el final del seu proper torn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The assassin's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Constitució ({@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Unstable Mark
entries: When the assassin casts an innate spell, each creature within 10 feet of the assassin ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de força; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Sageta de Foc (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc. Un objecte flamable impactat per aquest encanteri s'encèn si no és dut ni vestit.

action.name: Esfera Cromàtica (1/Dia)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 90 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}18 ({@dice 4d8}) damage of a type chosen by the assassin: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The Lord of Blades és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 20. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de artificer preparats:

trait.name: Adamantine Plating
entries: Any critical hit against the Lord of Blades becomes a normal hit.

trait.name: Bladed Armor
entries: A creature that grapples the Lord of Blades or is {@condition grappled} by him takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany tallant. A creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany tallant if it starts its turn grappling or being {@condition grappled} by the Lord of Blades.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the Lord of Blades moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with his adamantine sixblade on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 19} or be pushed fins a 10 peus away and knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Resiliència Guerraforjat
entries: The Lord of Blades has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition emmetzinat}, is immune to disease, and him no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Lord of Blades fa tres atacs: two with his adamantine sixblade and one with his bladed wings.

action.name: Adamantine Sixblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de força.

action.name: Bladed Wings
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Sageta de Foc (Truc)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The Lord of Blades makes one weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The Lord of Blades casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The Lord of Blades casts a spell of 2nd level or lower from his spell list that takes 1 action to cast.

legendary.name: Blade Dash (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The Lord of Blades moves up to his speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat, then makes one attack with his adamantine sixblade. He can make one bladed wings attack against each creature he moves past.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: The quori's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The quori fa tres atacs: one pincer attack, one attack with its claws, and one stinger attack.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany contundent. L'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The quori has two pincers, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 4d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fibló
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Saviesa amb {@dc 14} o be {@condition acovardit} of the quori durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 14} or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitat} and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and retè l'alineament, la Intel·ligència, la Saviesa, el Carisma, i la immunitat a ésser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}. La resta d'estadístiques són les de l'objectiu, però no en guanya els coneixements, trets de classes, o competències.

The possession lasts until the body es queda a 0 punts de vida, the quori ends it com a acció bonus, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. Quan la possessió acaba the quori reapareix en un espai lliure a 5 peus del cos. L'objectiu és immune a possessions d'aquest this quori's durant 24 hores des que supera la salvada o la possessió acaba.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The councilor és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

spells: {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Aura of Radiance
entries: The councilor magically desprèn llum forta en un radi de 15 peus i llum tènue uns 15 peus adicionals. The councilor can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action. If the bright light overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created that darkness is dispelled.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The councilor té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The councilor makes two Radiant Touch attacks.

action.name: Radiant Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany radiant.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (3/Dia)
entries: The councilor touches another creature. The target magically regains 18 ({@dice 3d8 + 5}) hit points and is freed from one curse afflicting it (councilor's choice).

action.name: Batussa Incendiària (5th-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries: The councilor chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in un cilindre de 10 peus de radi i 40 d'alçada centered on that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. A creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany radiant; si supera, en rep la meitat. If the councilor casts this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (its choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} per cada nivell per sobre de 5.

legendary.name: Tocar
entries: The councilor makes one attack with its Radiant Touch.

legendary.name: Shimmering Aura (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The councilor channels positive energy into its Aura of Radiance. Until the end of the councilor's next turn, desprén llum forta en un radi de 30 peus, i llum ténue uns 30 peus adicionals. Any creature that starts its turn in the bright light ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition encegat} until the end of the councilor's next turn.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The soldier magically desprèn llum forta en un radi de 10 peus i llum tènue uns 10 peus adicionals. The soldier can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The soldier té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The soldier makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos, plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany radiant if the target is a fiend or undead.

monster.name: Valenar Hawk
idiomes: and Silvà però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The hawk can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hawk bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hawk and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of fins a 100 peus.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Valenar Hound
idiomes: and Silvà però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The hound can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hound bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hound and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of fins a 100 peus.

trait.name: Oïda i Olfacte Aguts
entries: The hound té avantatge a tirades de Saviesa (Percepció) que involucrin l'oïda o l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

monster.name: Valenar Steed
idiomes: and Silvà però no pot parlar

trait.name: Bonding
entries: The steed can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the steed bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the steed and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of fins a 100 peus.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Guerraforjat Colossus
idiomes: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The colossus és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the colossus falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The colossus té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The colossus fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Towering Terror
entries: Any enemy outside the colossus that starts its turn within 30 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 26} or be {@condition acovardit} until the start of the enemy's next turn. If the enemy's saving throw is successful, it is immune to this colossus's Towering Terror durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The colossus fa tres atacs—one with its slam and two with its eldritch turrets—and then uses Stomp.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) de dany contundent, and the colossus can push the target fins a 20 peus away from it.

action.name: Eldritch Turret
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 18} a impactar, 300 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de força, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: The colossus stomps one of its feet a un punt del terra within 20 feet of it. Any creature in un cilindre de 20 peus de radi i 20 d'alçada centered on this point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 26} or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany contundent and fall {@condition enderrocat}. Until the colossus uses its Stomp again or moves, the creature is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature (or another creature within 5 feet of it) can use its action to make a {@dc 26} Força check. On a success, the creature relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the colossus and is no longer {@condition restrained}.
Structures, as well as nonmagical objects that are neither being worn nor carried, take the same amount of damage if they are in the cylinder (no save).

action.name: Incinerating Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The colossus fires a beam of light en una línia de 150 peus de llarg i 10 d'ample. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 26}. Qui falli rep 60 ({@damage 11d10}) de dany radiant; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this beam is disintegrated, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Resiliència Guerraforjat
entries: The guerraforjat has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition emmetzinat} and is immune to disease. it no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The guerraforjat makes two armblade attacks.

action.name: Armblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When an attacker the guerraforjat can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 5 feet of the guerraforjat, the guerraforjat can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

monster.name: Guerraforjat Titan
idiomes: comprèn els idiomes dels seus creadors però no pot parlar

trait.name: Platforms
entries: The guerraforjat titan has two platforms built into its chassis. One Medium or smaller creature can ride on each platform without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the guerraforjat, they must use spears or weapons with abast and the target must be Large or larger.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The guerraforjat titan fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The guerraforjat titan makes one axehand attack and one hammerfist attack.

action.name: Axehand
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany tallant, mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany tallant if the target is {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Hammerfist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Sweeping Axe {@recharge}
entries: The guerraforjat titan makes a sweep with its axehand, and each creature within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. A creature takes 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany tallant; si supera, en rep la meitat.

vulnerable.note: from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The rakshasa's és Saviesa ({@dc 11} per salvar conjur). The rakshasa pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Immunitat Màgica Limitada
entries: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 1st level or lower unless it wishes to be. Té avantatge a salvades contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The rakshasa's són màgics.

trait.name: Martial Prowess (1/Torn)
entries: When the rakshasa hits a creature with a atac armat cos a cos, the attack deals an extra 11 ({@dice 2d10}) damage of the weapon's type, and la criatura ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 15}. On a failure, the rakshasa can push the creature fins a 10 peus away from it, knock the creature {@condition enderrocat}, or make the creature drop one item it is holding of the rakshasa's choice.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The rakshasa makes three atacs armats cos a cos. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.
